name: Suwarudo (itch)
description:
Currently this game features a versus mode and a singleplayer mode. Each mode pits two combatants against each other.

Customize your 'Sword' and take on your opponent to either beat their 'Sword' to the point where they can't battle, or knock them out of the ring!

The more squarely, and the more speed you have when colliding with your opponent the more damage you will do, but watch out! If they have a better speed, trajectory, and stats, you'll be the one biting the dust!

WASD to move player 1, arrow keys for player 2

Shift or B button to use special attack.

I (Keyboard) or Y button(controller) to open inventory.

Escape or "Start"? button to open menu.
